data.title: EIGENSOFT
data.description: The EIGENSOFT package combines functionality from our population genetics methods (Patterson et al. 2006) and our EIGENSTRAT stratification correction method (Price et al. 2006).
data.name: EIG

evidence: "The EIGENSOFT package implements methods from the following 2 papers" â€“ indicates a domain-specific research analysis package, i.e., an application users run.
"All C executables are in the bin/ directory." and instructions to run programs like "./pcatoy" show it is executed directly as an end-user tool for analyses.

Build and install instructions are via cloning and running make in src ("cd src" "make" "make install"), with no mention of package managers or binary releases, indicating distribution via source repository.
